actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Security and Terrorism.

official_title: A bill to allow the criminal and civil forfeiture of real property under the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970.

summary.text: Amends the Controlled Substances Act to subject to forfeiture all real property used or intended to be used in the growing, manufacturing, or distributing of controlled substances for profit, where such activity is punishable by more than one year's imprisonment. Excepts from such forfeiture the interest of an owner who did not have knowledge of or consent to the unlawful act. Subjects to forfeiture the real property of persons engaged in continuing criminal enterprises.

titles.title: A bill to allow the criminal and civil forfeiture of real property under the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970.
